vendor_name: HS HOTSSON Hotel CDMX Condesa Sur
title: Stylish All-Suite Mexico City Escape in Bohemian La Condesa Just 20 Minutes From Chapultepec Park
description: Discover the best of Mexico City through its most beloved bohemian district with an all-suite stay at HS HOTSSON Hotel CDMX Condesa Sur. Head out to explore La Condesa’s abundance of chic boutiques, artisanal cafes and fountain-filled promenades, or stay in to enjoy upscale traditional Mexican cuisine at Especialidades Restaurant. For some nature therapy, stroll just 20 minutes to find yourself in the vast emerald forest of Chapultepec Park, the oldest and grandest park of its kind in Latin America.
location_description: HS HOTSSON Hotel CDMX Condesa Sur
offer_address: Av. Revolución 67, Tacubaya, Miguel Hidalgo, 11870 Mexico City, Mexico

title: Mexico City Escape in Vibrant Polanco with Rooftop Pool & Bar
description: Kimpton Virgilio, an IHG Hotel is a vibrant oasis in the heart of Mexico City. Located in Pilanco, you'll be best placed to explore the upscale boutiques, restaurants and museums that make this neighbourhood so undeniably cool. Spend your days basking in the sunshine by the rooftop pool and keeping hydrated at La Caña bar. For an authentic Spanish and Latin tapas experience, head down to Pepe Mesa Española restaurant, where share platters and colourful cocktails burst with flavour.
offer_address: Anatole France 79 Polanco III Secc. Mexico City 11550, Mexico

title: Mexico City Glamour in Historic Reforma District with Sky-High Pool, Rooftop Bar & Spa
description:
Perched along Mexico City’s legendary Reforma Avenue, this urban Sofitel sanctuary offers a seamless fusion of Parisian elegance and Mexican carnivalesque spirit. Soak up panoramic views of the cityscape from the hotel's plush rooms, relax with blissful treatments at the spa and enjoy a dip in the city's highest saltwater pool, perched on the 38th floor.

Savour Mediterranean specialities at Balta, Mexican fire-inspired cuisine at Bajel, and cocktails paired with city views at Cityzen Rooftop Bar. For something unique, head to the speakeasy Freehouse for drinks and Prohibition-era charms. When it's time to explore, you'll find yourself steps from the Angel of Independence monument while Zona Rosa's boutiques and nightlife await.
offer_address: 297 Avenue Paseo De La Reforma, Mexico City 06500, Mexico

vendor_name: Novotel Mexico City World Trade Center
title: Mexico City Stylish Escape Near World Trade Center with Onsite Restaurant
description:
Experience the vibrant culture and cosmopolitan charm of Mexico City with a stay at a stylish hotel, perfectly located in the heart of the city's bustling World Trade Centre district. This is the perfect launchpad for travellers looking to explore the city's rich history, world-class museums and tantalising food scene.

Savour fresh Mexican fusion at Delia Bistro or make use of the hotels privileged location for a night on the town. When it's time to retreat to your city oasis keep up your routine at the fitness centre or savour in-room dining.
location_description: Novotel Mexico City World Trade Center
offer_address: Av. Insurgentes Sur 710, Col del Valle Nte, Benito Juárez, Mexico City 3100, Mexico

title: Mexico City Urban Luxury with Largest Wine Cellar in Latin America, Plus Five Restaurants & Two Bars
description: Discover the best of Mexico City with a stay at the five-star InterContinental Presidente Mexico City, an IHG Hotel. The hotel is home to the largest wine cellar in Latin America and boasts a variety of onsite eateries and bars: sample Japanese bites and craft cocktails at Tokoya Nigiri Bar, unique gin concoctions at Epicentro Gin & Tonic Bar, or home-style, rich Mexican plates at Chapulin. For a touch of wellbeing, head to Hela Spa for a relaxing facial or massage.
location_description: InterContinental Presidente Mexico City, an IHG Hotel
